sub_title: Senior Advisor Coastal and Marine Systems & Region coordinator Balkan at Deltares
summary: I am technical advisor with a scientific background and experience in the fields of environmental and water resources management, ranging from a site-specific engineering projects to a country/region level strategic planning and policy advisory. Perform best in the role of project leader and bussiness developer. Core topics covered are water/coastal engineering, hydrodinamics and water quality modelling, environmental assessment, pollution management, climate adaptation, and sustainable coastal zone development.
